            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【国务院常务会议提出防止大规模裁员】今天，国务院常务会议要求：①分类有序推动复工复产。②推动重点医疗防控物资企业尽快达产，确保一线防控需要。③有序组织务工人员返岗。④各地各部门要建立帮扶机制，纾解企业特别是民营、小微企业困难。⑤落实地方“菜篮子”、“米袋子”负责制，加强粮油菜肉蛋 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItU0g4G49" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471267921115017:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471267921115017&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【疫情期间不跳舞，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%9C%BA%E8%88%9E%E5%A4%A7%E5%A6%88%E6%8A%8A%E9%9F%B3%E5%93%8D%E9%80%81%E7%BB%99%E4%BA%A4%E8%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#广场舞大妈把音响送给交警#</a>】“宣传人员的小喇叭不如我们的音响好。”近日，江苏泗阳广场舞协会严女士，发现交警和工作人员播放疫情防控知识的喇叭声音有点小，她就把俱乐部70个广场舞音响送给交警。网友：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，给广场舞大妈点赞！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%8D%94%E6%9E%9D%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=荔枝新闻">@荔枝新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471261025788768:2017607-video:2017607%3A4471209191211036:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471261025788768:2286908003" title="JSTV荔枝视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLBe7L" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLBe7L" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>JSTV荔枝视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月12日 21:48</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%81%AB%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E7%97%85%E5%8F%8B%E5%8F%98%E5%BF%97%E6%84%BF%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#火神山医院病友变志愿者#</a>：想减轻医护人员的压力】吴先生是火神山医院第一批收治的患者，经过治疗病情已大为好转。看到繁忙辛苦的医护人员，他主动提出要当志愿者，在医院里帮忙推轮椅，为重症病友加油鼓劲。在他的带动下，许多轻症患者也加入到志愿者的行列。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%8B?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视军事">@央视军事</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471258495979341:1034-video:1034%3A4471090345607176:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471258495979341:2286908003" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6h2XzTn" alt="http://t.cn/A6h2XzTn" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6033414083&amp;cid=4471258768545851&amp;nick=·循跡星·&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471255107718299" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItTFAwnSH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 21:22" date="1581513752000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471255107718299:fromprofile"> 2月12日 21:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：失职必被问责，约谈敲响警钟】这场紧急约谈，指出了武汉疫情防控工作中的突出问题，也表明了中央在疫情防控上的决心和立场，为履职不到位的领导干部敲响了警钟。对不敢担当、推诿扯皮的，必须严肃问责，对因失职渎职造成严重后果、破坏防疫大局的，要依纪依法惩处。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471255107718299:1022-article:1022%3A2309354471255121133601:page_100206_home:2286908003::" title="人民网评：失职必被问责，约谈敲响警钟" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354471255121133601" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354471255121133601" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>人民网评：失职必被问责，约谈敲响警钟</a>                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4470852517067072" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【中央赴湖北指导组约谈武汉市副市长等3人 “要向这些患者挨个赔礼道歉”】“应收尽收是防控新冠肺炎疫情的关键，要把好事办好，怎么能把好事办坏？这些负责转运危重和重症病人的党员干部为什么不跟车？现在的武汉就是战时状态，这些人的行为十分恶劣。”<br>10日晚，在中央赴湖北指导组约谈会上，国务院 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4470852517067072&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbsndfa07gj20fr0fr0tk" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263gy1gbsndfa07gj20fr0fr0tk"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4470852517067072:2286908003" href="/2286908003/ItJcftEt2" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4470852517067072">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6216904015&amp;cid=4471250879408866&amp;nick=明天_越来越好&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4471245594224353" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItTqfhIWJ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 20:44" date="1581511484000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471245594224353:fromprofile"> 2月12日 20:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E4%BA%BA%E7%9A%84%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%A7%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#一个人的生产线#</a>：不孤单，很温暖<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月12日早晨，苏州一精密机械有限公司内，袁传伟忙个不停。从1月27日开始，他已连续工作16天。原本需要5名员工协同完成的生产线，他咬牙一个人扛了下来，将生产的消毒器零件送到组装工厂，在最短的时间内，发往火神山医院。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，“我从不是一 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItTqfhIWJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471245594224353:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471245594224353&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%A9%89%E6%8B%92%E5%85%AB%E6%97%AC%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA5%E4%B8%87%E6%8D%90%E6%AC%BE%23&amp;from=default">#民警婉拒八旬老人5万捐款#</a>：感动但不能收<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月12日，黑龙江双鸭山民警肖婧和同事执勤时，80岁的郭大娘走到警车旁，把一张5万元的定期存折和写有密码的纸条给民警，让其捐给疫区。肖婧介绍，大娘的老伴去世了，一个人生活，房子还是自己生火取暖的平房。“我们当时特别感动，但这钱我们不能收”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItTemkrJs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471238224873166:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471238224873166&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
            </div>
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E6%95%99%E5%B8%88%E8%B5%84%E6%A0%BC%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%B0%86%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#中小学教师资格考试将推迟举行#</a>】根据党中央、国务院关于新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情防控工作有关精神和教育部相关通知要求，在疫情流行期间不举办大型聚集性活动和考试，原定于3月中旬进行的中小学教师资格考试和教师资格认定工作推迟举行，具体考试时间和认定报名时间将根据疫 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItT5RsX1V" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471232956900099:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471232956900099&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【雨雪、大风、强降温齐上线！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%AD%89%E5%9C%B0%E5%B1%80%E5%9C%B0%E5%B0%86%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%9A%B4%E9%9B%AA%23&amp;from=default">#北京等地局地将出现暴雪#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%AE%E6%B0%94%E8%B1%A1%E5%8F%B0?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中央气象台">@中央气象台</a> 预计，13日至16日，强寒潮天气将至，中东部地区将出现大范围雨雪和大风、强降温天气。吉林东南部、辽宁东部、内蒙古中部、北京、天津等地局地将出现暴雪。中东部大部地区自北向南将出现8至12℃降温。温馨提示：寒潮将带来剧烈降 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSWIsVvK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471227286894260:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471227286894260&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471223146618303" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItSQ2rLIP?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 19:15" date="1581506132000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471223146618303:fromprofile"> 2月12日 19:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【中共中央政治局常务委员会召开会议 分析新冠肺炎疫情形势研究加强防控工作】中共中央政治局常务委员会2月12日召开会议，听取中央应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情工作领导小组汇报，分析当前新冠肺炎疫情形势，研究加强疫情防控工作。中共中央总书记习近平主持会议并发表重要讲话。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx2.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F884f7263ly1gbttyjz2a6j20ck0ckgmh.jpg">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【辽宁<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%91%AB%E8%8A%A6%E5%B2%9B%E5%B8%82%E4%B8%80%E4%BC%81%E4%B8%9A%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F%E7%88%86%E7%82%B8%23&amp;from=default">#葫芦岛市一企业发生爆炸#</a> 共造成5人死亡】2月11日，位于辽宁葫芦岛经济开发区的辽宁先达农业科学有限公司烯草酮车间发生一起爆炸事故。记者从葫芦岛市委宣传部获悉，经全力救援，截至2月12日1时10分，厂区明火完全扑灭。目前，3名失联人员已找到，均已死亡。此次事故共造成5人死亡、10人受伤， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSMnwOIx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471220877821457:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471220877821457&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471217476509465" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItSGTrjpn?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 18:52" date="1581504779000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471217476509465:fromprofile"> 2月12日 18:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【出征！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F316%E4%BA%BA%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%AD%9D%E6%84%9F%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江316人医疗队驰援湖北孝感#</a>】2月12日晚，黑龙江省支援湖北孝感医疗队在哈尔滨出征，驰援疫情阻击战前线。此次对口医疗队以新冠肺炎救治核心专业的医护人员为主，具有精湛医术和丰富的救治护理实践经验。据悉，这是黑龙江省派出的第三批支援湖北医疗队。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，盼凯旋！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSGTrjpn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471217476509465:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471217476509465&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331920&amp;ssig=NvA7jvTh0F" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471214791680279" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItSCz737h?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 18:42" date="1581504140000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471214791680279:fromprofile"> 2月12日 18:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【武汉日记Vlog：他们笑着走，我们继续守<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】”<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>11日，江汉、武昌“方舱医院”首批34位新冠肺炎治愈患者出院。人民网记者张婵：整个采访过程中，让我感动的除了医护人员，还有就是这些可爱的武汉市民。医院里症状比较轻的患者自发推举了病区“区长”协助医护人员，还有患者会和医护 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSCz737h" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471214791680279:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471214791680279&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【体育老师上网课：一个人的孤单vs一群人的狂欢<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/a1/2018new_doge02_org.png" title="[doge]" alt="[doge]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】近日，全国多校已开启网课模式。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%93%E8%82%B2%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E6%98%AF%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%B8%8A%E7%BD%91%E8%AF%BE%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#体育老师是如何上网课的#</a>？网友：太羡慕了居然可以有体育课！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471207955513773:2017607-video:2017607%3A4471182611906586:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471207955513773:2286908003" title="燃新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hL0M3h" alt="http://t.cn/A6hL0M3h" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>燃新闻的秒拍视频</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%87%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=燃新闻">@燃新闻</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%98%8C%E5%8C%BA%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%AF%B9%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%8A%E6%97%B6%E5%AE%89%E7%BD%AE%E7%9A%84%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E9%80%90%E4%B8%80%E9%81%93%E6%AD%89%23&amp;from=default">#武昌区组织对未及时安置的重症病人逐一道歉#</a>：武昌转运失职事件责任人被严肃处理】2月11日，武昌区政府领导来到武汉同济医院中法新城院区重症监护病房，向2月9日晚因武昌区所辖街道工作人员工作失职，而未能及时妥善安置的重症病人代表当面道歉。同时进行的，是责令相关街道负责人逐一对受影响患者 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSlv01sf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471204210005595:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471204210005595&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【人民网召开线上企业对策研讨会】11日，14位来自生活服务业、制造业、信息技术等领域的企业家以及3位经济领域专家学者，一同进入了人民网“在线通”视频会议室。3个小时的视频研讨会上，大家结合自身的战“疫”实践和纾困探索，为疫情中的企业走出困境、转型发展和创新提升提出了许 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4471202422999871&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbtrerfbnyj20t50dhq4h" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gbtrerfbnyj20t50dhq4h"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItSiCcAp1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471202422999871:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471202422999871&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数小于等于1，且大卡片是文章卡片，显示文章卡片-->
                                    <!-- LinkCard6 -->
        <!--区别处理-->
        <div class="WB_feed_spec WB_feed_spec_c S_bg1 S_line1 clearfix" action-type="widget_articleLayer" action-data="url=https%3A%2F%2Fweibo.com%2Fttarticle%2Fp%2Fshow%3Fid%3D2309354471202436481200&amp;target=_blank" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_card:4471202422999871:1022-article:4471202422999871:1022%3A2309354471202436481200:page_100206_home:2286908003:230935:2286908003:4471202422999871:2286908003:230935" exp-data="key=tblog_weibocard&amp;value=1022-article:4471202422999871:ori:4471202422999871:page:2286908003:230935&amp;src=//rs.sinajs.cn/j.gif">
        <div class="spec_box clearfix">

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>
    </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471200434237695" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItSfphMpV?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 17:45" date="1581500717000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471200434237695:fromprofile"> 2月12日 17:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【企业加油！20亿元专项基金到位】疫情之下不少企业迎来大考。近日，中国工商银行专门设立支持疫情防控专项基金20亿元。主要投资到湖北等疫情严重地区和北京等重点防控地区，重点支持医药和医疗器械生产流通，与疫情防控相关的信息技术、制造业、物流运输、环保产业、生活必需品保障等相关领域的企业。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->

    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                                                  </div>  
            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471196798118116" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItS9xy3Tm?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 17:30" date="1581499850000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471196798118116:fromprofile"> 2月12日 17:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【打牌、搓麻将、参加宴席，福建<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8E%86%E7%94%B0%E4%B8%80%E6%9D%91%E5%BA%84%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F24%E4%BE%8B%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E6%80%A7%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#莆田一村庄发生24例聚集性疫情#</a>】12日下午，福建省莆田市副市长胡国防在发布会上通报了金川村聚集性疫情情况。1月26日，金川村确诊3例来自同一家庭的新冠肺炎病例。经排查，3名确诊病例曾先后参加该村16日、18日两场露天宴席，且期间频繁参与打牌、搓麻将等，与大多数 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItS9xy3Tm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471196798118116:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471196798118116&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471196601320469" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItS9e5xvT?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 17:30" date="1581499803000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471196601320469:fromprofile"> 2月12日 17:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【谣言粉碎机上线！让我们一起解疑释惑说“新冠”】《论语》有言：道听而途说，德之弃也。针对国外因新冠肺炎而产生的疑惑、误解以及流言蜚语，人民网推出“解疑释惑说新冠”栏目，回应海外对疫情的关切，以权威答案消除误解、粉碎谣言。欢迎你提出问题，让我们来解答。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471196601320469:1022-article:1022%3A2309354471196618981572:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471196601320469:2286908003" title="回应海外关切&nbsp;解疑释惑说“新冠”" href="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354471196618981572" alt="https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309354471196618981572" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>回应海外关切&nbsp;解疑释惑说“新冠”</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->
                
				     <!--picture_count == 6-->

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609331920&amp;ssig=NvA7jvTh0F" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471194768612744" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItS6gA8ze?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 17:22" date="1581499366000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471194768612744:fromprofile"> 2月12日 17:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E7%94%B5%E6%80%BB%E5%B1%80%E5%85%8D%E8%B4%B9%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B180%E4%BD%99%E9%83%A8%E4%BC%98%E7%A7%80%E8%8A%82%E7%9B%AE%23&amp;from=default">#广电总局免费提供180余部优秀节目#</a>】据国家广电总局，日前已启动全国广播电视节目“众志成城 共同战疫”公益展播活动。根据安排，《大禹治水》《宇宙护卫队》《猪猪侠》等180余部、共近2000小时的优秀电视节目、动画片、纪录片、广播剧将无偿提供播出版权，在全国各级广播电视台广泛播出。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItS6gA8ze" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471194768612744:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471194768612744&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【今年高考会不会推迟？】12日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#教育部回应高考是否推迟#</a>：距离高考还有4个月，将密切关注疫情发展变化，会同相关部门和各地评估疫情对组织考试可能引发的问题，审慎研究制定今年高考方案。不少网友：这届高三太难了<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/75/2018new_gui_org.png" title="[跪了]" alt="[跪了]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B0%91%E6%B0%91%E5%B0%8F%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#民民小调查#</a> 你希望今年高考推迟吗？ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471190557382317:1022-hudongvote:1022%3A2317162020_231888_-_8b1907" title="人民网的微博投票" href="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_231888_-_8b1907" alt="https://vote.weibo.com/h5/index/index?vote_id=2020_231888_-_8b1907" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_vote">R</i>人民网的微博投票</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471185402657372" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRRab9iQ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 16:45" date="1581497133000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471185402657372:fromprofile"> 2月12日 16:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【千里送牛羊 “请湖北人民放心吃”！】200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉、200吨牛奶，草原人民把最优质绿色农畜产品送到湖北。直播中网友留言：同舟共济，北疆草原与荆楚大地在一起！草原辽阔宽广，从来不乏大爱。疫情面前，各民族像石榴籽一样紧紧抱在一起！<a title="人民网评：草原紧连荆楚&nbsp;各族共克时艰" href="http://t.cn/A6hLWc2X" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLWc2X" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>人民网评：草原紧连荆楚&nbsp;各族共克时艰</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网内蒙古频道">@人民网内蒙古频道</a>                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4470818904174414" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="人民网" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@人民网</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%94%AF%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B9%B3%E8%82%89%E5%88%B6%E5%93%81600%E5%90%A8%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古支援湖北乳肉制品600吨#</a>今日启运】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>11日下午，一件件牛奶在呼和浩特市集装上车。内蒙古支援湖北省乳制品和肉制品等生活必需品今日启运。此次支援的物资包括：200吨羊肉、100吨牛肉、100吨猪肉和200吨牛奶。内蒙古自治区商务厅厅长田永告诉记者，这批物资由内蒙古自治区分别 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4470818904174414:2286908003" href="/2286908003/ItIk2hvXg" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4470818904174414">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月12日 17:17</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
                            <div comment_id="4471193510295471" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">
                <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
                <div class="list_con">
                    <div class="WB_text">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%BA%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E5%90%83%E5%84%BF%E8%8F%9C%23&amp;from=default">#湖北人不会吃儿菜#</a> 四川网友纷纷送菜谱】近日，50吨爱心蔬菜从四川雅安送到湖北，湖北网友表示感谢，但没见过儿菜也不知道怎么吃。四川网友急疯了，马上在线教怎么吃儿菜。第一种吃法煮腊肉、第二种直接煮了蘸蘸水吃、第三种吃法儿菜炒腊肉.......学会了吗？ <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=四川日报">@四川日报</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471183133515710:1034-video:1034%3A4471151150432278:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471183133515710:2286908003" title="四川日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLG4W7" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLG4W7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>四川日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【这个假期你胖了几斤？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E8%AF%B4%E4%B8%8D%E8%A6%81%E6%95%B4%E5%A4%A9%E5%9D%90%E7%9D%80%E8%BA%BA%E7%9D%80%E9%9D%A0%E7%9D%80%23&amp;from=default">#专家说不要整天坐着躺着靠着#</a>】中国疾控中心研究员表示：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E5%9C%A8%E5%AE%B6%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%E9%9D%99%E6%80%81%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA%23&amp;from=default">#疫情期间在家控制静态行为#</a>，不要整天坐着、躺着、靠着，可参照在学校的作息，每坐一小时站起来活动一会儿。对肥胖儿童，适当增加活动量、减少食量，控制油炸和甜食，但不要让孩子刻意减重。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471180608447910:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471180510560300:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471180608447910:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLNkTY" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLNkTY" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=1660914925&amp;screen_name=一只猪蹄丶" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月12日 16:27</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471177315269051" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRE7m6IH?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 16:13" date="1581495205000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471177315269051:fromprofile"> 2月12日 16:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【宅在家没食欲？专家：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%BD%93%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%9A%E8%A6%81%E5%A5%BD%E5%A5%BD%E5%90%83%E9%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#疫情当下一定要好好吃饭#</a>】中国疾控中心研究员：疫情期间，很多人宅在家里，减少外出，没有心思好好吃饭。我们要告诉大家，疫情当下一定要好好吃饭。民以食为天，吃是为了营养。营养跟不上，容易被感染，感染后也不易恢复。好好吃饭，为身体提供足够营养素。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItRE7m6IH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471177315269051:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471177315269051&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1937863674&amp;cid=4471177151650505&amp;nick=化蝶飞0405&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BC%9A%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#教育部回应高考是否会推迟#</a>】12日召开的国务院联防联控机制发布会上，教育部高校学生司司长王辉：要把考生和涉考工作人员健康安全放第一位，距离高考还有4个月，将密切关注疫情发展变化，会同相关部门和各地评估疫情对组织考试可能引发的问题，审慎研究制定今年高考方案。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471170059719513:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471169999634458:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471170059719513:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLXnok" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLXnok" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%AA%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%88%B7%E6%A1%A3%E5%8F%AF%E6%9A%82%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E4%B8%A4%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#未就业学生户档可暂留学校两年#</a>】教育部高校学生司司长王辉表示，目前已采取四项措施：一加强网上就业服务，暂停高校毕业生现场招聘活动，大力推进网上就业服务。网上签约、办理就业手续；二是大力拓宽就业渠道，鼓励大学生参军入伍，鼓励毕业生到基层就业创业；三是着力强化重点保护，对贫 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItRskDTqA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471170009507860:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471170009507860&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4471168423937718" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRpMgwnA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:38" date="1581493084000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471168423937718:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%95%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E5%BB%B6%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#教育部回应考研复试是否延期#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%95%E5%A3%AB%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E7%94%9F%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%95%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%8F%A6%E8%A1%8C%E9%80%9A%E7%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#全国硕士研究生复试时间另行通知#</a>】2月12日，国务院联防联控机制召开新闻发布会，教育部相关负责人介绍，教育部明确原定近期举行的自划线高校考研复试、考博复试推迟举行，具体由所在地本地疫情防控情况确定。原定4月初进行全国硕士研究生复试将另行通知。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月12日 15:38</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471166947698705" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRnowiMF?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:32" date="1581492733000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471166947698705:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8D%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%AE%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E6%AF%8F%E4%BD%8D%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E9%83%BD%E5%81%9A%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#不建议高校要求每位老师都做直播课#</a>】在12日召开的国务院联防联控机制发布会上，教育部高等教育司司长吴岩表示，根据教育部安排，22个线上平台的2.4万门课程是几年来精心组织培育遴选的好课。教育部特别不提倡、不鼓励、不建议高校要求每位老师都制作直播课。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471166947698705:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471166837129220:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471166947698705:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLitHk" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLitHk" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4471166897447914" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRnjvfxE?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:32" date="1581492721000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471166897447914:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部回应：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%9C%E6%9D%91%E5%81%8F%E8%BF%9C%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BA%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E4%B8%8A%E7%BD%91%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#农村偏远山区孩子如何上网课#</a>？】教育部基础教育司司长吕玉刚：2月17日开始，中国教育电视台第四频道，将通过直播卫星互通平台，向全国用户传输有关课程资源，将覆盖偏远、贫困农村地区。特别是网络信号较弱，有限电视没有通达的地区，这将解决这些地区学生的学习问题。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItRnjvfxE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471166897447914:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471166897447914&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <!-- 赞 -->
                                <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4471168289266172&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2052032133&amp;commentmid=4471166897447914" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class="">                                <em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em>                                        <em>1</em></span></a>                                </span></li>
                                <!-- 赞 -->
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月12日 15:37</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471165999571338" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRlRE9Wq?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:28" date="1581492507000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471165999571338:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E8%A6%81%E7%AD%89%E8%A7%A3%E9%99%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%B5%81%E5%8A%A8%E7%AE%A1%E6%8E%A7%23&amp;from=default">#湖北学生返校要等解除人员流动管控#</a>】对来自不同区域的学生，将采取不同的返校措施。首先每一所学校要进行消杀方面的准备。来自疫情严重地区的、和确诊病人有过接触的、有咳嗽、发烧症状的同学要进行单独隔离；其他地区同学每天量体温、不需要隔离。湖北地区学生返校之前要满足湖北当地的要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItRlRE9Wq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471165999571338:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471165999571338&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4471163742805446" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRiebLP8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:19" date="1581491969000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471163742805446:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【教育部回应：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#学校恢复开学时如何防控疫情#</a>？】教育部应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组办公室主任王登峰：待恢复开学时，要做到错区域、错层次、错时间开学。到达学校之后，对来自不同区域的学生，采取不同的措施。确保返校过程的安全、有序、错峰。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471163742805446:1042163-video:1042163%3A4471163662041120:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471163742805446:2286908003" title="人民网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hLMBBw" alt="http://t.cn/A6hLMBBw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民网的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471158998752256" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItRazAIRq?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 15:00" date="1581490838000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471158998752256:fromprofile"> 2月12日 15:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471158563001355" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItR9ScAMX?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 14:58" date="1581490734000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471158563001355:fromprofile"> 2月12日 14:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4471158563001355"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>53</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E7%BD%91%E8%AF%BE%E6%97%B6%E8%A2%AB%E8%80%81%E5%B8%88%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%E5%8F%AB%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%23&amp;from=default">#上网课时被老师要求叫妈妈#</a>？结局爆笑<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/83/2018new_kuxiao_org.png" title="[允悲]" alt="[允悲]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】疫情期间停课不停学。近日一段师生互动视频，引发爆笑。小男生一个“啥？”包含了太多的疑问…<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%AA%E7%BD%91%E8%AF%BE%E5%92%8B%E8%BF%98%E6%9C%89%E8%BF%99%E4%B9%88%E6%97%A0%E7%90%86%E7%9A%84%E8%A6%81%E6%B1%82%23&amp;from=default">#上个网课咋还有这么无理的要求#</a> （松鼠视频）<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4471153839592173:1034-video:1034%3A4470893192085527:page_100206_home:2286908003:4471153839592173:2286908003" title="松鼠视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6hwrKDq" alt="http://t.cn/A6hwrKDq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>松鼠视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E8%97%8F%E5%94%AF%E4%B8%80%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#西藏唯一确诊病例治愈出院#</a>】今天下午2时26分，西藏唯一确诊新冠肺炎病例张某某，办理完所有治愈出院手续，离开西藏自治区第三人民医院。张某某1月22日至24日经由武昌乘火车到达拉萨市。1月25日晚，张某某自行前往西藏自治区指定的定点医疗机构就诊并收住入院，接受隔离 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItQYEklZA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471151604851102:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471151604851102&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4471150485153696" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItQWQlCI8?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-12 14:26" date="1581488807000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4471150485153696:fromprofile"> 2月12日 14:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【公安部公布<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BA%94%E6%80%A5%E8%BF%90%E8%BE%93%E4%BF%9D%E9%9A%9C24%E5%B0%8F%E6%97%B6%E7%94%B5%E8%AF%9D%23&amp;from=default">#应急运输保障24小时电话#</a>】2月11日，公安部下发通知，部署各地公安机关特别是交管部门进一步做好疫情防控道路交通保通保畅工作，确保重点物资运输畅通和人员车辆正常通行。公安部要求，要向社会公布应急运输保障服务电话并确保24小时畅通，及时提供应急运输服务，协调解决驾驶人反映的困 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItQWQlCI8" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4471150485153696:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4471150485153696&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/7345470092" usercard="id=7345470092">所有博主</a>：求关🙋助<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%84%BF%E6%98%AF%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#我儿是北京警察#</a>，举手之劳，麻烦各位顶一下。🙏🙏🙏        </div>

【国务院常务会议提出防止大规模裁员】今天，国务院常务会议要求：①分类有序推动复工复产。②推动重点医疗防控物资企业尽快达产，确保一线防控需要。③有序组织务工人员返岗。④各地各部门要建立帮扶机制，纾解企业特别是民营、小微企业困难。⑤落实地方“菜篮子”、“米袋子”负责制，加强粮油菜肉蛋 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                 【人民网评：失职必被问责，约谈敲响警钟】这场紧急约谈，指出了武汉疫情防控工作中的突出问题，也表明了中央在疫情防控上的决心和立场，为履职不到位的领导干部敲响了警钟。对不敢担当、推诿扯皮的，必须严肃问责，对因失职渎职造成严重后果、破坏防疫大局的，要依纪依法惩处。<a                                                                                  <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\"                                                                                  【雨雪、大风、强降温齐上线！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%AD%89%E5%9C%B0%E5%B1%80%E5%9C%B0%E5%B0%86%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%9A%B4%E9%9B%AA%23&from=default\">#北京等地局地将出现暴雪#<\/a>】据<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%AE%E6%B0%94%E8%B1%A1%E5%8F%B0?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=中央气象台\">@中央气象台<\/a> 预计，13日至16日，强寒潮天气将至，中东部地区将出现大范围雨雪和大风、强降温天气。吉林东南部、辽宁东部、内蒙古中部、北京、天津等地局地将出现暴雪。中东部大部地区自北向南将出现8至12℃降温。温馨提示：寒潮将带来剧烈降 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/ItSWIsVvK\"                                                                                  【中共中央政治局常务委员会召开会议 分析新冠肺炎疫情形势研究加强防控工作】中共中央政治局常务委员会2月12日召开会议，听取中央应对新型冠状病毒感染肺炎疫情工作领导小组汇报，分析当前新冠肺炎疫情形势，研究加强疫情防控工作。中共中央总书记习近平主持会议并发表重要讲话。（央视） ​​​​                                            <\/div>\n 共造成5人死亡】2月11日，位于辽宁葫芦岛经济开发区的辽宁先达农业科学有限公司烯草酮车间发生一起爆炸事故。记者从葫芦岛市委宣传部获悉，经全力救援，截至2月12日1时10分，厂区明火完全扑灭。目前，3名失联人员已找到，均已死亡。此次事故共造成5人死亡、10人受伤， ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                  【出征！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F316%E4%BA%BA%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%AD%9D%E6%84%9F%23&from=default\">#黑龙江316人医疗队驰援湖北孝感#<\/a>】2月12日晚，黑龙江省支援湖北孝感医疗队在哈尔滨出征，驰援疫情阻击战前线。此次对口医疗队以新冠肺炎救治核心专业的医护人员为主，具有精湛医术和丰富的救治护理实践经验。据悉，这是黑龙江省派出的第三批支援湖北医疗队。<a
